docs.snippet: PARIS, March 26--An international theatre festival with twenty-three participating nations and a program that ranges from Euripides' "The Phoenicians" to Jack Gelber's "The Apple" will begin here tomorrow.
docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS, March 26--An international theatre festival with twenty-three participating nations and a program that ranges from Euripides' "The Phoenicians" to Jack Gelber's "The Apple" will begin here tomorrow.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 29-- The Council of the Organization of American States voted today to express a "firm hope" that the rebel prisoners in Cuba would have every legal guarantee at their trial.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 29-- The Council of the Organization of American States voted today to express a "firm hope" that the rebel prisoners in Cuba would have every legal guarantee at their trial.
docs.abstract: OAS Council votes, 16-0, 4 abstaining, to voice hopes that captives will have fair trial

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 30 The United States and Brazil are near agreement on a $276,000,000 program of combined aid for poor and droughtstricken northeast Brazil.
